segments.text: This makes me so worried, looking at this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink overflow is bad enough, water flooding out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman doesn't see it, focused on her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She might slip on that wet floor any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the children, what are they thinking?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy climbing high on that tilting stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll tumble down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's right there, could get hurt too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're stealing cookies, but it's not worth the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting soaked, what a shame.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to yell and stop this before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a calm garden, so different from here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Poor family, this could end in tears.
segments.speaker: PAR
